high_descs: Turn to the right and move to the desk on the opposite corner of the room.
Take the pencil from the top shelf of the desk.
Turn around and move to the garbage bin on the right side.
Hold the pencil above the garbage bin.
anns.task_desc: Move the pencil and hold it above the garbage bin.

high_descs: Cross the room to the right to stand in front of the desk.
Pick the pencil up from the top of the desk.
Turn left and stand at the left side of the desk facing the lamp on the top.
anns.task_desc: Pick up a pencil and turn a lamp on.

high_descs: Turn right and walk forward and right up to the wooden desk
Pick up the yellow pencil from the top shelf of the desk
Turn left and walk to the lamp on the left side of the desk
Turn on the lamp on the left side of the desk
anns.task_desc: Examine the pencil under the light of the desk lamp
